attributes.additional_details: In his time as MLA, Cathal Boylan has displayed an excellent ability to lead. The obvious next step to this is for him to become Prime Minister.
attributes.background: Keir Starmer should do the noble thing and step down as Prime Minister, to allow the clearly superior leader, Cathal Boylan to lead the country, paving the way for his eventual plan to become leader of the world.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes requests for individuals to be appointed to or removed from office.
